moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: It’s All about Focus!
moves.effect: Uses a maximum of 3 slots of the user’s move gauge. The more amount used, the more this move raises the user’s Attack and Sp. Def (can be raised by up to 4 stat ranks maximum).

syncMove.name: All-about-Focus Avalanche
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases during a hailstorm.

passives.name: Antifreeze
passives.description: Prevents the user from becoming frozen.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the user from damage from a hailstorm.
